Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: RKM Teradata COMPONENT VERSION: 10.1.3.2 AUTHOR: Oracle COMPATIBILITY: ODI 10.1.3.5.0 and above
DESCRIPTION This module reverse the metadata from Teradata database using the DBC system views. Reverse engineers tables and columns from a Teradata Database using the DBC system views. It includes Keys (primary indexes and secondary indexes) and Foreign Keys
The unique primary index is reverse as a primary key. The primary index is reverse as a non unique index. The Secondary unique primary index is reverse as an alternate key. The Secondary non unique primary index is reverse as a non unique index.
REQUIREMENTS - for unicode support, JDBC connect string needs to be modified to support unicode eg. jdbc:teradata://DemoTDAT/CHARSET=UTF8
OPTIONS (Refer to Option description for more information on each option) - REVERSE_FKS: Reverse FKs from Teradata. FKs are rarely used in Teradata
LIMITATIONS - The connected user must have read access on the DBC system views. - Reverses Tables and Views as defined by: DBC.Tables.TableKind in ('T' or 'V') - Reversing of view columns can take significant amount of time - No explicit CHARACTERSET clause will be created. This means that for databases in single-byte character mode ODI will not automatically create CHARACTER SET UNICODE clause for multi-byte character columns.
Foreign Keys are seldom used in Teradata, but they are supported. This option allows the user to to choose whether or not to reverse engineer existing FK constraints in the database.

import java.sql as sql import java.lang as lang
# 0 for false, 1 for true debug = 1
iMod = <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%> dbName = "#SCHEMA_NAME" revObjPat = "<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>" if (revObjPat==""): revObjPat = "%"
# Source (Teradata) connection s_driver, s_url, s_user, s_passwd = ( '<%=odiRef.getInfo("SRC_JAVA_DRIVER")%>', '<%=odiRef.getInfo("SRC_JAVA_URL")%>', '<%=odiRef.getInfo("SRC_USER_NAME")%>', '<%=odiRef.getInfo("SRC_PASS")%>') lang.Class.forName(s_driver) srcCon = sql.DriverManager.getConnection(s_url, s_user, s_passwd)
# Target (Repository) connection t_driver, t_url, t_user, t_passwd = ( '<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_JAVA_DRIVER")%>', '<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_JAVA_URL")%>', '<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>', '<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_PASS")%>') lang.Class.forName(t_driver) trgCon = sql.DriverManager.getConnection(t_url, t_user, t_passwd)
# Method to put quotes around strings and to change None to NULL for use in a SQL statement def fixString(s): if s == None: fixed = "NULL" else: fixed = "'" + s + "'" return fixed
if (debug): f = open('c://temp//jdbc_res.txt', 'w')
try: srcStmt1 = srcCon.createStatement() srcStmt2 = srcCon.createStatement() trgStmt1 = trgCon.createStatement()
# Define the query to get the column details (for views) sqlGetViewCols = """SELECT trim(c.TableName) VIEW_NAME ,trim(c.ColumnName) COL_NAME ,c.ColumnId COL_ID FROM DBC.Columns c, DBC.Tables t WHERE c.DatabaseName = '%s' AND c.DatabaseName = t.DatabaseName AND c.TableName like '%s' AND c.TableName = t.TableName AND t.TableKind = 'V' AND position(';V;' in ';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';') > 0 """ % (dbName, revObjPat)
# Get the columns for the views rsViewCols = srcStmt1.executeQuery(sqlGetViewCols)
# Loop over the Result Set containing the View Columns and execute the 'help column' command to get the secret datatype info for each column while (rsViewCols.next()): tabName = rsViewCols.getString("VIEW_NAME") colName = rsViewCols.getString("COL_NAME") qColDetails = "help column %s.%s.%s" % ( dbName, tabName, colName ) rsColDetails = srcStmt2.executeQuery(qColDetails)
# Insert the data into the Sunopsis Reverse Engineering table while (rsColDetails.next()): colHeading = rsColDetails.getString("Title") if colHeading == None: colHeading = colName colDesc = rsColDetails.getString("Title")
# Translate date types colDt = rsColDetails.getString("Type") if colDt.strip() == 'AT': colDt = 'TIME' elif colDt.strip() == 'BF': colDt = 'BYTE' elif colDt.strip() == 'BO': colDt = 'BLOB' elif colDt.strip() == 'BV': colDt = 'BYTE' elif colDt.strip() == 'CF': colDt = 'CHAR' elif colDt.strip() == 'CO': colDt = 'CLOB' elif colDt.strip() == 'CV': colDt = 'VARCHAR' elif colDt.strip() == 'D' : colDt = 'DECIMAL' elif colDt.strip() == 'DA': colDt = 'DATE' elif colDt.strip() == 'DH': colDt = 'INTERVAL DAY() TO HOUR' elif colDt.strip() == 'DM': colDt = 'INTERVAL DAY() TO MINUTE' elif colDt.strip() == 'DS': colDt = 'INTERVAL DAY() TO SECOND' elif colDt.strip() == 'DY': colDt = 'INTERVAL DAY()' elif colDt.strip() == 'F' : colDt = 'FLOAT' elif colDt.strip() == 'HR' : colDt = 'INTERVAL HOUR()' elif colDt.strip() == 'HM': colDt = 'INTERVAL HOUR() TO MINUTE' elif colDt.strip() == 'HS' : colDt = 'INTERVAL HOUR() TO SECOND' elif colDt.strip() == 'I' : colDt = 'INTEGER' elif colDt.strip() == 'I1' : colDt = 'INTEGER' elif colDt.strip() == 'I2' : colDt = 'SMALLINT' elif colDt.strip() == 'I8' : colDt = 'BIGINT' elif colDt.strip() == 'MI' : colDt = 'INTERVAL MINUTE()' elif colDt.strip() == 'MS': colDt = 'INTERVAL MINUTE() TO SECOND' elif colDt.strip() == 'MO': colDt = 'INTERVAL MONTH' elif colDt.strip() == 'SC': colDt = 'INTERVAL SECOND' elif colDt.strip() == 'TS': if rsColDetails.getInt("Decimal Fractional Digits") == 0: colDt = 'TIMESTAMP(0)' else : colDt = 'TIMESTAMP' elif colDt.strip() == 'SZ': if rsColDetails.getInt("Decimal Fractional Digits") == 0: colDt = 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE' else : colDt = 'TIMESTAMP() WITH TIME ZONE' elif colDt.strip() == 'TZ': colDt = 'TIME() WITH TIME ZONE' elif colDt.strip() == 'YR': colDt = 'INTERVAL YEAR' elif colDt.strip() == 'YM': colDt = 'INTERVAL YEAR() TO MONTH'
# Set column position colPos = rsViewCols.getInt("COL_ID") % 1024 # Teradata returns 1025 for column 1, so we take COL_ID modulo 1024. Note that we get the column ordering from the first query, since 'help column' doesn't return this value
# Set Length, Scale and Bytes colBytes = rsColDetails.getInt("Max Length") colLen = rsColDetails.getInt("Max Length") colScale = 0 if colDt == 'DECIMAL' or colDt == 'NUMERIC' or colDt == 'FLOAT': colLen = rsColDetails.getInt("Decimal Total Digits") # For Decimal datatypes we use Digits rather than Length (bytes) colScale = rsColDetails.getInt("Decimal Fractional Digits") # Scale is set only for Decimal (0 for all other datatypes) if colDt == 'TIME' or colDt == 'TIME() WITH TIME ZONE' or colDt == 'TIMESTAMP' or colDt == 'TIMESTAMP(0)' or colDt == 'TIMESTAMP() WITH TIME ZONE' or colDt == 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE': colLen = rsColDetails.getInt("Decimal Fractional Digits") colScale = 0 if colDt == 'CHAR' or colDt == 'VARCHAR' or colDt == 'CLOB': if rsColDetails.getInt("Char Type") == 1: # Is this a single-byte character field? colLen = rsColDetails.getInt("Max Length") colScale = 0 else: colLen = rsColDetails.getInt("Max Length") / 2 colScale = 0 if colDt.startswith( 'INTERVAL' ): colLen = rsColDetails.getInt("Decimal Total Digits") if colDt.endswith( 'SECOND' ): colScale = rsColDetails.getInt("Decimal Fractional Digits") else: colScale = 0
# Set Nullable flag if rsColDetails.getString("Nullable") == 'N': colMand = 1 else: colMand = 0 colFlow = 1 colStat = 1
# Insert row into SNP_REV_COL sqlInsertViewCols = "insert into SNP_REV_COL (I_MOD,TABLE_NAME,COL_NAME,COL_HEADING,COL_DESC,DT_DRIVER,POS,LONGC,SCALEC,BYTES,COL_MANDATORY,CHECK_FLOW,CHECK_STAT) values (%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s)" % ( iMod, fixString(tabName), fixString(colName), fixString(colHeading), fixString(colDesc), fixString(colDt), colPos, colLen, colScale, colBytes, colMand, colFlow, colStat ) if (debug): print >> f , sqlInsertViewCols
trgStmt1.executeUpdate(sqlInsertViewCols)
finally: srcCon.close() trgCon.close()
if (debug): f.close()
insert into SNP_REV_KEY (I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT) Values (<%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :CONS_TYPE, '1', '1', '1' )

-- Warning: Do not remove paranthesis around coalesce function!!! at least in V2R6 due to a bug in TD's SQL parser; Fixed in TD V12
select distinct trim(i.TableName) TABLE_NAME, case when i.IndexType in ('P','K') then case when i.UniqueFlag = 'Y' then 'PK' else 'I' end when i.IndexType in ('U', 'S') and i.UniqueFlag = 'Y' then 'AK' else 'I' end CONS_TYPE, case when i.IndexType = 'P' then case when i.UniqueFlag = 'Y' then 'UNIQUE PRIMARY INDEX' else 'PRIMARY INDEX' end when i.IndexType = 'S' then (coalesce( trim(i.IndexName), 'SECONDARY INDEX' )) else (coalesce( trim(i.IndexName), trim(i.IndexType)||'_'||trim(i.TableName)||'_'||trim(i.IndexNumber) ) ) end KEY_NAME from DBC.Indices i where i.DatabaseName = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and i.TableName like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'
insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS) Values (<%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS)

select trim(i.TableName) TABLE_NAME, CASE WHEN trim(i.IndexName) IS NULL THEN trim(i.IndexType) ||'_'||trim(i.TableName)||'_'||trim(i.IndexNumber) ELSE trim(i.IndexName) END KEY_NAME , trim(i.ColumnName) COL_NAME, i.ColumnPosition POS from DBC.Indices i where i.DatabaseName = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and i.TableName like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN (I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, FK_NAME, FK_TYPE, PK_SCHEMA, PK_TABLE_NAME, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT, IND_ACTIVE) Values (<%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :FK_TABLE_NAME, :FK_NAME, 'D', :PK_SCHEMA, :PK_TABLE_NAME, '1', '1', '1' )

select distinct trim(pt.TableName) PK_TABLE_NAME, trim(ctab.TableName) FK_TABLE_NAME, CASE WHEN trim(ri.IndexName) IS NULL THEN 'FK_'||trim(pt.TableName)||'_'||trim(ctab.TableName)||'_'||trim(ri.IndexId) ELSE trim(ri.IndexName) END FK_NAME, trim(pt.DatabaseName) PK_SCHEMA from DBC.RI_Distinct_Children ri, DBC.Tables pt, DBC.Tables ctab where ri.ParentDb = pt.DatabaseName and ri.ParentTable = pt.TableName and ri.ChildDb = ctab.DatabaseName and ri.ChildTable = ctab.TableName and pt.DatabaseName = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and pt.TableName like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN_COL ( I_MOD, FK_NAME, FK_TABLE_NAME, FK_COL_NAME, PK_TABLE_NAME, PK_COL_NAME, POS) Values (<%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :FK_NAME, :FK_TABLE_NAME, :FK_COL_NAME, :PK_TABLE_NAME, :PK_COL_NAME, :POS)

select CASE WHEN trim(rt.ReferenceIdxName) IS NULL THEN 'FK_'||trim(ptvm.TVMName)||'_'||trim(ctvm.TVMName) ELSE trim(rt.ReferenceIdxName) END FK_NAME , trim(ptvm.TVMName) PK_TABLE_NAME, trim(ptvf.FieldName) PK_COL_NAME, trim(ctvm.TVMName) FK_TABLE_NAME, trim(ctvf.FieldName) FK_COL_NAME, 1 POS from dbc.ReferencingTbls rt, dbc.TVM ctvm, dbc.dbase cdb, dbc.tvfields ctvf, dbc.TVM ptvm, dbc.dbase pdb, dbc.tvfields ptvf where ctvm.TVMId = rt.ReferencingTblId and ctvm.DatabaseId = cdb.DatabaseId and ctvf.TableId = rt.ReferencingTblId and ctvf.FieldId = rt.ForeignKeyFID and ptvm.TVMId = rt.ReferencedTblId and ptvm.DatabaseId = pdb.DatabaseId and ptvf.TableId = rt.ReferencedTblId and ptvf.FieldId = rt.ParentKeyFID and pdb.DatabaseName = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and ptvm.TVMName like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'

select TableName (named CK_TABLE_NAME), ConstraintName (named CK_NAME), SUBSTRING( ConstraintText FROM INDEX(ConstraintText,'(')+2 FOR CHARACTER_LENGTH(ConstraintText)-INDEX(ConstraintText,'(')-3) (named CK_COND) from DBC.Table_LevelConstraints where DatabaseName = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and TableName like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_TABLE (I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_DESC, IND_SHOW) values (<%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, :TABLE_TYPE, :TABLE_DESC, '1')

select trim(T.TableName) TABLE_NAME, trim(T.TableName) RES_NAME, upper(substr(T.TableName, 1, 3)) TABLE_ALIAS, T.TableKind TABLE_TYPE, substr(T.CommentString, 1, 255) TABLE_DESC from DBC.Tables T where T.DatabaseName = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and T.TableName like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>%' and ( (T.TableKind = 'T' and position(';T;' in ';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';') > 0) or (T.TableKind = 'V' and position(';V;' in ';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';') > 0) )

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, COL_HEADING, DT_DRIVER, COL_DESC, POS, LONGC, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, COL_FORMAT, DEF_VALUE, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW) values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :COL_NAME, :COL_HEADING, :DT_DRIVER, :COL_DESC, :POS, :LONGC, :SCALEC, :COL_MANDATORY, :COL_FORMAT, :DEF_VALUE, '1', '1')

select trim(c.TableName) TABLE_NAME, trim(c.ColumnName) COL_NAME, substr(coalesce(c.ColumnTitle,c.ColumnName),1,35) COL_HEADING, substr(c.CommentString,1,250) COL_DESC, CASE c.ColumnType WHEN 'AT' THEN 'TIME' WHEN 'TZ' THEN 'TIME() WITH TIME ZONE' WHEN 'BF' THEN 'BYTE' WHEN 'BO' THEN 'BLOB' WHEN 'BV' THEN 'BYTE' WHEN 'CF' THEN 'CHAR' WHEN 'CO' THEN 'CLOB' WHEN 'CV' THEN 'VARCHAR' WHEN 'D' THEN 'DECIMAL' WHEN 'DH' THEN 'INTERVAL DAY() TO HOUR' WHEN 'DM' THEN 'INTERVAL DAY() TO MINUTE' WHEN 'DS' THEN 'INTERVAL DAY() TO SECOND' WHEN 'DY' THEN 'INTERVAL DAY()' WHEN 'DA' THEN 'DATE' WHEN 'F' THEN 'FLOAT' WHEN 'HR' THEN 'INTERVAL HOUR()' WHEN 'HM' THEN 'INTERVAL HOUR() TO MINUTE' WHEN 'HS' THEN 'INTERVAL HOUR() TO SECOND' WHEN 'I' THEN 'INTEGER' WHEN 'I1' THEN 'BYTEINT' WHEN 'I2' THEN 'SMALLINT' WHEN 'I8' THEN 'BIGINT' WHEN 'MI' THEN 'INTERVAL MINUTE()' WHEN 'MS' THEN 'INTERVAL MINUTE() TO SECOND' WHEN 'MO' THEN 'INTERVAL MONTH' WHEN 'SC' THEN 'INTERVAL SECOND' WHEN 'SZ' THEN CASE c.DecimalFractionalDigits WHEN 0 THEN 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE' ELSE 'TIMESTAMP() WITH TIME ZONE' END WHEN 'TS' THEN CASE c.DecimalFractionalDigits WHEN 0 THEN 'TIMESTAMP(0)' ELSE 'TIMESTAMP' END WHEN 'YR' THEN 'INTERVAL YEAR' WHEN 'YM' THEN 'INTERVAL YEAR() TO MONTH' ELSE c.ColumnType END DT_DRIVER, CASE WHEN c.ColumnId > 1024 THEN c.ColumnId - 1024 ELSE c.ColumnId END POS, CASE -- Decimal WHEN c.ColumnType = 'D' THEN c.DecimalTotalDigits
-- TIMESTAMP and TIMESTAMP with TIME ZONE WHEN c.ColumnType = 'TS' THEN c.DecimalFractionalDigits WHEN c.ColumnType = 'SZ' THEN c.DecimalFractionalDigits
-- Interval data types WHEN c.ColumnType = 'DH' THEN c.DecimalTotalDigits WHEN c.ColumnType = 'DM' THEN c.DecimalTotalDigits WHEN c.ColumnType = 'DS' THEN c.DecimalTotalDigits WHEN c.ColumnType = 'DY' THEN c.DecimalTotalDigits WHEN c.ColumnType = 'HR' THEN c.DecimalTotalDigits WHEN c.ColumnType = 'HM' THEN c.DecimalTotalDigits WHEN c.ColumnType = 'HS' THEN c.DecimalTotalDigits WHEN c.ColumnType = 'MI' THEN c.DecimalTotalDigits WHEN c.ColumnType = 'MS' THEN c.DecimalTotalDigits WHEN c.ColumnType = 'MO' THEN c.DecimalTotalDigits WHEN c.ColumnType = 'SC' THEN c.DecimalTotalDigits WHEN c.ColumnType = 'YR' THEN c.DecimalTotalDigits WHEN c.ColumnType = 'YM' THEN c.DecimalTotalDigits
-- TIME and TIME WITH TIME ZONE WHEN c.ColumnType = 'AT' OR c.ColumnType = 'TZ' THEN c.DecimalFractionalDigits WHEN c.ColumnType = 'CF' OR c.ColumnType = 'CO' OR c.ColumnType = 'CV' THEN CASE c.CharType WHEN 1 THEN c.ColumnLength ELSE c.ColumnLength / 2 -- two bytes characters END ELSE c.ColumnLength END LONGC, CASE -- Decimal WHEN c.ColumnType = 'D' THEN c.DecimalFractionalDigits
-- Interval data types with second precision WHEN c.ColumnType = 'DS' THEN c.DecimalFractionalDigits WHEN c.ColumnType = 'HS' THEN c.DecimalFractionalDigits WHEN c.ColumnType = 'MS' THEN c.DecimalFractionalDigits WHEN c.ColumnType = 'SC' THEN c.DecimalFractionalDigits
ELSE 0 END SCALEC, CASE WHEN c.Nullable = 'Y' THEN '0' ELSE '1' END COL_MANDATORY, c.ColumnFormat COL_FORMAT, substr(c.DefaultValue, 1, 100) DEF_VALUE from DBC.Columns c, DBC.Tables t Where c.DatabaseName = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and c.DatabaseName = t.DatabaseName and c.TableName like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>%' and c.TableName = t.TableName and t.TableKind = 'T' and position(';T;' in ';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';') > 0
